channel.title: Need help with adding objects and other stuff
channel.description:
Problem 1: How do I add objects around the world? I went to objects.cfg. I added [b]object = 2004 (CoordX) (CoordY) 1[/b] in there. I put the coords exactly right. But when I compile and go into the server they arent there. :confused: And No, I do not get errors while compiling. ;D
Problem 2: How do I make portals take you to certain points? :confused:

item.title: Need help with adding objects and other stuff
